name: Tender Lamb and Chickpea Tagine
ingredientLines: 6 lamb shanks 3 tsp ground cumin 3 tsp ground coriander 1 tsp cinnamon 1 tsp dried oregano ½ -1 tsp cayenne pepper, to taste salt and ground black pepper, to taste 3 tbsp extra virgin olive oil 2 large onions, finely chopped 4 cloves garlic, finely chopped 2 tbsp Kickstarter Chilli Paste or 2-3 tsp finely chopped long red chilli or harissa, to taste 3 cups chicken or vegetable stock 1 cup dried apricots 3 cups cooked chickpeas or 2 x 400g cans chickpeas, drained 2 tbsp lemon juice ¼ cup coriander leaves, to serve

6 lamb shanks 3 tsp ground cumin 3 tsp ground coriander 1 tsp cinnamon 1 tsp dried oregano ½ -1 tsp cayenne pepper, to taste salt and ground black pepper, to taste 3 tbsp extra virgin olive oil 2 large onions, finely chopped 4 cloves garlic, finely chopped 2 tbsp Kickstarter Chilli Paste or 2-3 tsp finely chopped long red chilli or harissa, to taste 3 cups chicken or vegetable stock 1 cup dried apricots 3 cups cooked chickpeas or 2 x 400g cans chickpeas, drained 2 tbsp lemon juice ¼ cup coriander leaves, to serve

6 lamb shanks 3 tsp ground cumin 3 tsp ground coriander 1 tsp cinnamon 1 tsp dried oregano ½ -1 tsp cayenne pepper, to taste salt and ground black pepper, to taste 3 tbsp extra virgin olive oil 2 large onions, finely chopped 4 cloves garlic, finely chopped 2 tbsp Kickstarter Chilli Paste or 2-3 tsp finely chopped long red chilli or harissa, to taste 3 cups chicken or vegetable stock 1 cup dried apricots 3 cups cooked chickpeas or 2 x 400g cans chickpeas, drained 2 tbsp lemon juice ¼ cup coriander leaves, to serve
6 lamb shanks
3 tsp ground cumin
3 tsp ground coriander
1 tsp cinnamon
1 tsp dried oregano
½ -1 tsp cayenne pepper, to taste
salt and ground black pepper, to taste
3 tbsp extra virgin olive oil
2 large onions, finely chopped
4 cloves garlic, finely chopped
2 tbsp Kickstarter Chilli Paste or 2-3 tsp finely chopped long red chilli or harissa, to taste
3 cups chicken or vegetable stock
1 cup dried apricots
3 cups cooked chickpeas or 2 x 400g cans chickpeas, drained
2 tbsp lemon juice
¼ cup coriander leaves, to serve
